"Murriah": "I feel like I can finally move on. I will do my utmost!"
"I've managed to go about things normally... Although, there is still one slight thing still bothering me..."
"If you don't mind, there is something I'd like to speak with you about. Would you be willing to help?"
"...What? Why am I sweating? Wh-Why else, we're in a d-desert of course!"
"Now, let's go get those Dread Enemies!"
"I suppose this was a bad time to ask... Oh, no, everything's fine. Pay no mind."
"You really are magnificent. I'm nothing compared to you."
"But I am still an ARKS. I'll do my utmost to follow in even a fraction of your footsteps!"
